line_1: Cheer thee in the sweet conviction,
An' rouse them up to strong conviction,
line_2: Tell them wha hae the chief direction,

line_1: An' rouse them up to strong conviction,
line_2: Scotland an' me's in great affliction,

line_1: An' rouse them up to strong conviction,
line_2: E'er sin' they laid that curst restriction
